Labels.Title: Comparison between a basal - bolus and a premixed insulin regimen in individuals with type 2 diabetes - results of the GINGER study .
Labels.Author: Fritsche A
Labels.ObjectiveDescription: using premixed insulin ( premix ) twice daily .
Labels.Precondition: subjects with type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) on premix , with or without metformin
Labels.ConclusionComment: An intensified basal - bolus regimen using glargine / glulisine results in a significantly superior glycaemic control vs . premix therapy in a population with long - standing insulin - treated T2D , with no increase in the rates of hypoglycaemia .
Labels.DoseDescription: Doses of each medication were adjusted on the basis of the glycaemic response .
